title: How to find the best technical team for a new start-up in Shenzhen - Quora

response.answer_text: The best technical team, no matter where you are in Shenzhen or other city, you should ask youself the following questions first: Which industry field do our new start-up company belong to?What kind of products do we sell?How about the scale of our new start-up company?4. What management model do we adopt? If you figure out these questions, I guess, you must know how to find the best and matched technical team.
You can never find existing best team for a start-up but identify the suitable people and try to organize the closest fit team members. It takes time to build.
